about_the_game:
"Welcome to WI Corp, soldier. Don't let it go to your head! Even if you passed the written test to become the first Moddie Operator, I still have the training ground to squeeze you! This corporation needs the best soldiers for its private militia, you're gonna need to earn that beautiful new gun, we don't call it M.O.D.D.I.E for no reason!" Proceed through various linear levels inside WI Corp's headquarters while defending it from a perilous threat to its secrets, using M.O.D.D.I.E, an high tech modular rifle, in this new single player, low-poly style, Twin-Stick Shooter.

  • THE NEW MODDIE OPERATOR

Play as the Moddie Operator, a new kind of soldier specialized in fast paced fighting thanks to his Dash ability, to dodge in the blink of an eye incoming dangers, and simultaneously Bash away his enemies.

  • M.O.D.D.I.E.: YOUR NEIGHBORHOOD MODULAR OFFENSIVE DEFENSE AND DETERRENCE INTEGRATED EQUIPMENT

As the Moddie Operator you will be issued the pinnacle of war engineering, M.O.D.D.I.E., the Modular Rifle. Upgrade it by exploring and finding new Radical Modules and Tactical Modules to combine them quickly and adapt M.O.D.D.I.E. to your favourite play style.

  • A NEW CYBER GANG MENACE

The Katari Clan are ruthless criminals in search for the most secret and valuable technologies hidden in WI Corp's facilities, your first day as Moddie Operator could not be more eventful, or could it?

  • LEARN ABOUT WI CORP'S SECRETS, EXPLORE THE HQ

Venture the depths of WI Corp's HQ through your defence of the company's secrets and witness them with your own eyes.

  • THANK YOU FOR PLAYING

    This game has been created as an Academic Project, thanks to the great effort of a small team and the valuable support of AIV - Accademia Italiana Videogiochi (Italian Videogame Academy).
